title: High-Dose Vitamin D Reduces Heart Attack Risk
author: Healing River Chiropractic
description: Taking a high-dose vitamin D supplement every day reduces your risk of a heart attack and bypass surgery.
cleaned_text: Chiropractic provides chiropractic care and nutritional services in a holistic wellness center with a focus on addressing the patient's condition to restore the body's health, not suppress or control symptoms. Many are overwhelmed with pain and are desperate for healthcare that doesn't depend on prescription drugs and surgery. Healing River Chiropractic utilizes extremely gentle and powerfully effective holistic chiropractic techniques along with nutrition-focused Morphogenic Field Technique. This combination aims to restore and allow your body's own symphony of health to play naturally and beautifully again. Our progressive model of health and unconventional healing approach is not found in the Stillwater Valley and rarely elsewhere in the world. With years of experience, our care providers are capable of analyzing your body and creating a custom pain relief and rehabilitation plan to benefit your health. We understand the importance of educating you on natural approaches to healthcare so that you can heal quickly. Our care focuses on treating the Three Pillars of Health, which are:. Conditions We Treat We always appreciate hearing from our patients about their care experience at Healing River Chiropractic. Please take a couple of minutes to write a testimonial that we can publish on our website. We will only use your first name and the initial of your last name. Healing River Chiropractic is offering CBD (Cannabidiol) products at a 20% discount in September. We have a range of products from Carpe Diem that provide health-conscious alternatives to traditional medicine. Available are CBD oils, body lotion, softgels, gummies, muscle cream and roll-on muscle gel. Carpe Diem CBD products (all non-GMO) help calm and soothe the mind and body as well as provide a night full of quality sleep. We use cookies to analyze website traffic and optimize your website experience. By accepting our use of cookies, your data will be aggregated with all other user data.
